## Datasets

::: {.paper}
### MAP-AI: Measuring AI Adoption Across Firms in Europe {.paper-title}

::: {.paper-meta}
with [Terry Gregory (LISER)](https://sites.google.com/view/terrygregory){target="_blank"}
:::

::: {.paper-abstract}
A firm-level indicator of Artificial Intelligence adoption in Europe, covering more than three million firm websites from Belgium, France, Germany, and Luxembourg (2016--2024). The repository contains the data and documentation for the MAP-AI indicator.
:::
